constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 185 (Thursday, October 21, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. TAKANO:
H.R. 5671.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the United States Constitution,
authorized by Congress power to provide for the common
Defense and general Welfare of the United States.''
[Page H5792]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

title: To authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to furnish seasonal influenza vaccines to certain individuals, and for other purposes.
